# Airmar 150WX WeatherStation

## Overview

The Airmar 150WX is a comprehensive integrated weather station that measures wind speed and direction, air temperature, relative humidity, and barometric pressure.

## Key Features

- **Manufacturer**: Airmar Technology Corporation
- **Model**: 150WX
- **Type**: Meteorological Sensor
- **Deployment**: Wing-mounted, approximately 5m above sea level

## Measured Variables

- Wind speed and direction (WIND_SPEED, WIND_FROM)
- Wind components (UWND, VWND, WWND)
- Wind gusts (GUST_WND)
- Air temperature (TEMP_AIR)
- Relative humidity (RH)
- Barometric pressure (BARO_PRES)

## Specifications

| Parameter | Range | Accuracy |
|-----------|-------|----------|
| Wind Speed | 0-40 m/s | ±0.3 m/s or 3% |
| Wind Direction | 0-360° | ±2° |
| Temperature | -40 to +80°C | ±0.3°C |
| Humidity | 0-100% | ±3% |
| Pressure | 300-1100 hPa | ±0.5 hPa |

## Links

- [Manufacturer Product Page](https://www.airmar.com/weather-description.html?id=154)
- [Airmar Technology](https://www.airmar.com/)

## Deployment Notes

Mounted on the Saildrone wing to provide clear exposure to atmospheric conditions, approximately 5 meters above sea level. The elevated position minimizes interference from the sea surface and vehicle structure.
